content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipeda district court the case involved two parties referred to as the defendant and plaintiff 2 the defendant was ordered to pay certain fees and compensation while plaintiff 2 was also ordered to pay fees and compensation the court awarded specific properties to both parties the court also declared that a land plot and an apartment were common matrimonial property with each party receiving a share the court discussed various articles of the civil code related to matrimonial property the applicant sought the dissolution of their marriage and requested ownership of certain assets and financial compensation the defendant denied the allegations and counterclaimed for the dissolution of the marriage the court will need to determine the division of property and consider the best interests of the minor children the court will also assess the financial capacity of both parties the court supported the action and counterclaim dissolved the marriage and made specific awards and orders the court dismissed the remainder of the application counterclaim and ordered each party to pay the others costs

metadata.cost: 121.60 EUR (stamp duty) + 992.00 EUR (professional fees) by the defendant; 648.40 EUR (stamp duty)+  955.20 EUR (professional fees) +  11.20 EUR (court fees)  by the plaintiff
